name: Hide And Seek (itch) (Casimir_Gr)
description:
Move with WASD. 

Space to jump.

Use E to pick up boxes and switch switches.

Use a left-mouse click to shoot at remote switches.

There is a bug, which stops respawn points from working if you transition from one level to another. Respawn points work if you start the level from the main menu, so please if you finish the level restart the game and select next level from main menu.
